metadata.title: CVE-2018-5786 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is an infinite loop andapplication hang in the get_fileinfo function (lrzip.c). Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via acrafted lrz file.

criterions.comment: lrzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
